story_arceus_01_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
To all the sync pairs here today, thank you for
your patience!
story_arceus_01_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The Arceus Cup—a tournament to showcase the
bonds between people and Pokémon for a
deity—is finally here!
story_arceus_01_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: And with that, we’re ready to begin!
